title: Social Media Specialist Entry Level NEW!
full_description: Ultara Holdings, Inc. has been building a culture of excellence since 1995. We are a diverse company with business activities ranging from both retail and wholesale distribution and product development and manufacturing. We are an international company with headquarters in Dallas, Texas and our operations are spread across 9 US states and 2 Canadian provinces. GeoShack, Inc., our largest subsidiary, distributes state of the art technology that’s changing the way the world works in construction, surveying, agriculture, landfill, mining and many other fields. GeoShack, Inc. is the largest Topcon dealer worldwide and we pride ourselves on providing the best solutions in positioning and machine control products, installation, support, training, and service to our customers.As we continue to grow in the marketplace, we are looking for a driven Social Media Specialist to attract and interact with targeted virtual communities and networks individual users to join our corporate office in Dallas, Texas. The goal is to gradually achieve superior customer engagement and intimacy, website traffic and revenue by strategically exploiting all aspects of the social media marketing roadmap.The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of how each social media channel works and how to optimize content so that it is engaging on those channels. You will be responsible for joining relevant conversations on behalf of the brand and “soft selling” the products by providing support to current and prospective customers. The position has a lot of variety and requires someone who is knowledgeable, patient, and pays careful attention to details.Responsibilities:Build and execute social media strategy through competitive
